```javascript livedemo template=vstory
const defaultAppearAction = {
  action: 'appear',
  payload: {
    animation: {
      duration: 1000,
      easing: 'linear'
    }
  }
};
const defaultDisappearAction = (startTime, duration = 1000) => {
  return {
    action: 'disappear',
    startTime,
    payload: {
      animation: {
        duration,
        easing: 'linear'
      }
    }
  };
};

function merge(...args) {
  return Object.assign({}, ...args);
}
const scene1 = {
  id: 'scene1',
  actions: scene1Characters.map(({ character, appearAction, disappearAction }) => {
    const characterId = character.id;
    const characterActions = [];
    if (appearAction) {
      characterActions.push(merge({}, defaultAppearAction, appearAction));
    }

    if (disappearAction !== false) {
      characterActions.push(merge({}, defaultDisappearAction(2000), disappearAction));
    }

    return {
      characterId,
      characterActions
    };
  })
};

const createCaption = (text, startTime, disappearTime) => {
  const id = `caption-${text}-${Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000)}`;
  return {
    character: {
      id,
      type: 'Text',
      position: {
        x: width / 2,
        y: height - 80
      },
      options: {
        graphic: {
          text: text,
          fontSize: 22,
          fontWeight: 'bold',
          fill: 'white',
          lineHeight: '150%',
          align: 'center',
          textAlign: 'center',
          boundsPadding: [0, 6, 0, 6],
          background: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'
        }
      }
    },
    appearAction: {
      action: 'appear',
      startTime,
      payload: {
        animation: {
          duration: 100,
          easing: 'easeInOut'
        }
      }
    },
    disappearAction: {
      action: 'disappear',
      startTime: disappearTime,
      payload: {
        animation: {
          duration: 300,
          easing: 'easeInOut',
          effect: 'fade'
        }
      }
    }
  };
};

const scene2 = {
  id: 'scene2',
  actions: scene2Characters.map(({ character, appearAction, disappearAction, actions }) => {
    const characterId = character.id;
    const characterActions = [];
    if (appearAction) {
      characterActions.push(merge({}, defaultAppearAction, appearAction));
    }

    if (disappearAction !== false) {
      characterActions.push(merge({}, defaultDisappearAction(2000), disappearAction));
    }

    if (actions) {
      characterActions.push(...actions);
    }

    return {
      characterId,
      characterActions
    };
  })
};

    // 按index拆分成两组，每组10个
    const group = index < 5 ? 0 : 1;
    const moveIcons = group === 0 ? [0] : [10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15];
    return {
      character: {
        id: `scene3-coin-${index}`,
        type: 'Image',
        position: {
          x: 220 + group * 400 + Math.random() * 100,
          y: 260 + Math.random() * 100,
          width: 60,
          height: 60
        },
        options: {
          graphic: {
            image: coin
          }
        }
      },
      appearAction: {
        action: 'appear',
        startTime: 6300,
        payload: {
          animation: {
            duration: 300,
            easing: 'easeInOut'
          }
        }
      },
      actions: moveIcons.includes(index)
        ? [
            {
              action: 'moveTo',
              startTime: 7500 + group * 1000,
              payload: {
                destination: {
                  x: 100 + group * 300 + Math.random() * 60,
                  y: 70 + Math.random() * 60
                },
                animation: {
                  duration: 800,
                  easing: 'quadInOut'
                }
              }
            }
          ]
        : [],
      disappearAction: {
        action: 'disappear',
        startTime: 14000,
        payload: {
          animation: {
            duration: 600,
            easing: 'easeInOut',
            effect: 'fade'
          }
        }
      }
    };
  }),
  // 字幕
  createCaption('然而，税收会给人们带来负担', 0, 3000),
  createCaption('因此，税收是累进税，', 3200, 5000),
  createCaption('例如，所得税通常对高收入者征收更高的税率', 5300, 7000),
  createCaption('只要累进税能征收相当多的钱，就能减少不平等', 7300, 11000)
];
const scene3 = {
  id: 'scene3',
  actions: scene3Characters.map(({ character, appearAction, disappearAction, actions }) => {
    const characterId = character.id;
    const characterActions = [];
    if (appearAction) {
      characterActions.push(merge({}, defaultAppearAction, appearAction));
    }

    if (disappearAction !== false) {
      characterActions.push(merge({}, defaultDisappearAction(2000), disappearAction));
    }

    if (actions) {
      characterActions.push(...actions);
    }

    return {
      characterId,
      characterActions
    };
  })
};
const scene4Characters = [
  {
    character: {

        height

    },
    appearAction: {

        }
      }
    },

    actions: [
      {
        action: 'scaleTo',

              duration: 5000,

            }
          }

      }
    ]
  },
  {
    character: {

        }
      }
    },
    appearAction: {
      action: 'appear',
      startTime: 5000,
      payload: {
        animation: {
          duration: 100,
          easing: 'easeInOut'
        }
      }
    },
    disappearAction: false,
    actions: [
      {
        action: 'scaleTo',
        startTime: 5000,
        payload: [
          {
            animation: {
              duration: 5000,
              easing: 'linear',
              effect: 'scale'
            },

            }

    },
    appearAction: {
      action: 'appear',
      startTime: 10000,
      payload: {
        animation: {
          duration: 100,

        }

  // 字幕
  createCaption('政府如何征税以及这些资源最终如何使用', 0, 5000),
  createCaption('决定了对贫困和不平等的影响', 5200, 10000)
];
const scene4 = {
  id: 'scene4',
  actions: scene4Characters.map(({ character, appearAction, disappearAction, actions }) => {
    const characterId = character.id;
    const characterActions = [];
    if (appearAction) {
      characterActions.push(merge({}, defaultAppearAction, appearAction));
    }

    if (disappearAction !== false) {
      characterActions.push(merge({}, defaultDisappearAction(2000), disappearAction));
    }

    if (actions) {
      characterActions.push(...actions);
    }

    return {
      characterId,
      characterActions
    };
  })
};

const dsl = {
  acts: [
    {
      id: 'defaultAct',
      scenes: [scene1, scene2, scene3, scene4]
    }
  ],
  characters: [
    ...scene1Characters.map(({ character }) => character),
    ...scene2Characters.map(({ character }) => character),
    ...scene3Characters.map(({ character }) => character),
    ...scene4Characters.map(({ character }) => character)
  ]
};

const story = new VStory.Story(dsl, {
  dom: CONTAINER_ID,
  scaleX: 'auto',
  scaleY: 'auto',
  width,
  height,
  background: 'white'
});
const player = new VStory.Player(story);
story.init(player);

player.play(-1);

window['story'] = story;
window['vstory'] = story;
```
